@LeoDiCaprio  simplified by the Phoenicians and named after their word for water, mem , ultimately coming from Proto-Semitic *maʾ-/*may-.
@LeoDiCaprio Mem is believed to derive from the Egyptian hieroglyphic symbol for water
@LeoDiCaprio Mem also Meem or Mim is 13th letter of Semitic abjads, Phoenician Mēm  Hebrew Mēm מ, Aramaic Mem  Syriac Mīm ܡܡ,  Arabic Mīm م

@LeoDiCaprio M 
13th letter, from Greek mu, from Semitic mem.
